PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_Superelevation
PropertySetDef.Definition: Specifies the general properties for a Superelevation event.

PropertyDef.Name: Side
PropertyDef.Definition: Specifies if the width is measured to the RIGHT or to the LEFT of the curve referenced by the placement, or if the same value is applied to BOTH sides.

PropertyDef.Name: Superelevation
PropertyDef.Definition: Specifies the superelevation as a ratio measure (slope) at the location of the event.

PropertyDef.Name: TransitionSuperelevation
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of transition of superelevation from previous event to this one.
